meeting_request.description: Hi, I'm Jessica, a second-year math major. Last semester was really tough — I fell behind in most of my courses, and I had to take a bunch of electives just to stay in the math track. Now I’m trying to catch up, but everything is getting harder. I’m still struggling with math concepts, and I’m getting frustrated. I’m also dealing with some personal issues that are affecting my academic performance, and I don’t know if I’m falling apart or if I’m just not cut out for math. I’m open to talking about how to improve academically, but I’m not sure where to start. I want someone who can help me navigate this challenging major and work out a plan for improvement.
